comments: My favourite prof yet. She\'s hilarious and insightful and sarcastic. I highly recommend any class with Dr. Banks.

I thought this class would be another useless writing skills course, but Dr. Banks did an amazing job with it. She\'s funny, personable, smart, and really clear - one of the best teachers I\'ve ever had. I will definitely be taking more classes with her in the future
Very good class. Especially since it was 100 people and usually those classes are just lectures/boring. She encouraged thinking and interpretations in every class.

If you\'re an English major, take as many of her courses as possible. She\'s intelligent, humorous, helpful and extremely fair in terms of testing and workload. And unlike some of the other professors, she isn\'t arrogant and doesn\'t believe that only her ideas are correct. Simply an awesome teacher.
So far the class is going good. She is funny and is interested in having students figure out things as a class rather than straight lecture. Lectures are interesting.

First time taking an English class, was not disappointed. Diverse and interesting book selection. One aspect I did not care for was the unstructured participation mark. Otherwise, pretty good class overall comparing literary works with their film counterparts.
Awesome Prof, very approchable and down to earth. I have had her twice and learned an exceeding amount in comparison to other profs.
Great Professor. Incredibly approachable and helpful.

One of the best lecturers I\'ve had the privilege of hearing! Gives a fair amount of context along with analysis. Entertaining as all get out. Midterm/exam/papers seem difficult, but she marks very generously.

Banks is my favorite Prof in the English department. I took her 3 times and loved every class.She is funny during lecture and keeps you interested the whole time. SHe is also very down to earth with is a great quality to have in a prof

Great prof, very helpful and approachable, lectures were easy to follow and take notes during, she never moved too fast through materiel because she writes on the board. Tests were not too difficult if you knew the material and attended classes. I learned a lot and would definitely take more classes with her given the opportunity.
